list.name: Changes
list.comment:
SCRUM-156: Frontend Management Features
Implement product creation form with full input fields (name, model, serial number, description, etc.). (PM - 11 - Frontend) Implement product price update interface. (SM - 12 - Frontend) Create "Delivery Management" page listing pending deliveries with details. (PM - 11 - Frontend) Build comment moderation panel with approve/disapprove functionality. (PM - 11 - Frontend) Add delivery status update feature to the Delivery Management page. (PM - 11 - Frontend) Implement product deletion and stock update interface. (PM - 11 - Frontend) Implement UI for managing product categories (add/remove). (PM - 11 - Frontend) Build discount management interface: select products, set discount rate. (SM - 12 - Frontend)
